xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/710912-Edith Piaf - Le Concert Ideal 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/32RhNcIDXgnXORBE9iTEyXsg5i4.jpg Two-volume programme featuring the woman widely regarded as France's greatest ever popular singer. An hour long documentary on Piaf's life and career is accompanied by live performances of her most popular songs, including 'La Vie en Rose' and 'Non, Je Ne Regrette Rien'. A compilation of 17 of her songs, all recorded live in various concerts, is edited together to produce 'The Perfect Concert'. Edith Piaf - Le Concert Ideal
